channel.title: Commands! Help!
channel.description: Hello, i've got commands in my server, but they dont work for mods or admins. I HAVE changed the playerights to 1 or 2 but still nothing happens if i e.g. do ::pure for moderator nothing happens. Help? :( but works for owner... :S

item.title: Commands! Help!
item.dc:creator: @blackmanbad blackmanbad
item.description:
@blackmanbad wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure") && c.playerRights >= 1) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP((150000), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((150000), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((150000), 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP((150000), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((150000), 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); }

Read full topic
